title: Adjusted Demand Deposits, All Banks, Total Time Deposits, Plus Currency Held by the Public for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1867-1906 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1907-1946 (3)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1947-1966. Data Are The Sum Of Series (Adjusted Demand Deposits, Time Deposits, All Commercial Banks, Plus Currency Held By The Public) And (Deposits In Mutual Savings Banks And Postal Savings System). Source: Friedman And Schwartz, A Monetary History Of The United States, 1867-1960 (NBER, 1963).

This NBER data series m14175b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14175b
